messages.messageBody:
Cool! Her friend request would come from either Lefty or Sally.

I think we¹ll probably be getting LBP2 as soon as it comes out! Her reading
has just exploded since she started playing the game, so I love it! :)

mel

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Playstation 3
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there -- I¹ve been on the list for years but don¹t take the time to read/respond much at all, but I saw the PS3 message pop up and thought I¹d respond.
messages.messageBody:
Hi there --

I¹ve been on the list for years but don¹t take the time to read/respond much
at all, but I saw the PS3 message pop up and thought I¹d respond. My
daughter (6) is crazy about Little Big Planet and I¹d love for to have some
nice unschooling kids to play it with! :)

Mel

messages.subject: Re: Playstation 3
messages.msgSnippet: We have a PS3 and we re waiting for Little Big Planet 2 s release eagerly. We don t do a lot of Internet gaming with it, though, mostly just things like
messages.messageBody:
We have a PS3 and we're waiting for Little Big Planet 2's release
eagerly. We don't do a lot of Internet gaming with it, though, mostly
just things like Assassin's Creed and the like.

Deb R

messages.subject: Playstation 3
messages.msgSnippet: I know a lot of people have Xboxes but does anyone have playstation3?  We were given one for Christmas and the boys would love to meet up with other people
messages.messageBody:
I know a lot of people have Xboxes but does anyone have playstation3? We were given one for Christmas and the boys would love to meet up with other people online to play the few games we currently have if anyone is interested?

Morag
